original_title: People’s Bank, several State institutions get new heads
original_body_lines: The Committee on High Posts has approved the appointments of two ministry secretaries and six chairpersons of state institutions, the Communications Department of Parliament said.

Accordingly, the Committee has approved the appointment of Yamuna Perera as the new Secretary to the Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment and R.M.W.S. Samaradivakara as the new Secretary to the Ministry of Water Supply and Estate Infrastructure Development.
The Committee on High Posts also approved the appointment of Sujeewa Rajapaksa as the Chairman of the People's Bank.

Meanwhile. the appointments of Prof. S.R.D. Rosa as the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Atomic Energy Board, Ratnasiri Kalupahana as the Chairman of the State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka, Eng. A. Galketiya as the Chairman of the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB), Stella Marapana as the Chairperson of the Public Performance Board and Jayantha Wijeratne as the Chairman of the National Aquaculture Development Authority have been approved by the Committee on High Posts.
